headline: Paylocity, Qualys, 8x8, BlackLine, and AppLovin Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after fears of disruption from artificial intelligence spooked investors, leading to a broad-based sell-off.

headline: AppLovin Confronts Short Seller Claims As AI Shifts Reshape Outlook
summary: AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP) is facing short seller accusations of money laundering, followed by a sharp stock drop and an investor investigation. The company has publicly rejected the allegations, which introduce fresh legal and regulatory risk for shareholders to consider. At the same time, Google’s Genie 3 world model is raising questions about how new AI tools could reshape the video game industry and affect AppLovin’s role in it. AppLovin is also refocusing on AI driven adtech and moving...

headline: AppLovin: The Market Is Giving Us A Chance To Load Up (Earnings Preview)
summary: AppLovin (APP) is reiterated as a 'Buy' ahead of its Q4 2025 earnings, with strong support at its 52-week moving average.

summary: After a strong 2025 performance, AppLovin started off the year on a down note.
